titleStmt.title: Humane industry, or, A history of most manual arts deducing the original, progress, and improvement of them : furnished with variety of instances and examples, shewing forth the excellency of humane wit.
titleStmt.author: Powell, Thomas, 1608-1660.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Henry Herringman, and are to be sold at his shop ...,

notesStmt.note: Written by T. Powell. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in Harvard University Libraries.
